body:
Hi Mostapha,   It is really great to know that the full suite of components for energy simulation for Honeybee and GrizzlyBear is released at the [AEC Tech Symposium and Hackathon](http://core.thorntontomasetti.com/aec-technology-symposium-2014/)! Regarding this, I have two questions:   1)      I can't find the installation files in the "food4rhino" website, in which Version 0.0.57 and 0.0.51 are still the latest version released on April 8th, 2014.                 I was wondering if you could help me to get these full suite of components - especially including GrizzlyBear.   2)      In addition, I have some questions regarding the model exchange between Rhino/Grasshopper and Designbuilder ([http://www.designbuilder.co.uk/](http://www.designbuilder.co.uk/)), which is a commonly used software tool for checking building energy and thermal comfort and only accepts gbXML format file. I am quite interested in how GH models interoperate with the gbXML format. In order to achieve this, I have tried the GeometryGym gbXML components ([http://geometrygym.blogspot.nl/2014/04/gbxml-for-rhinograsshopper.html](http://geometrygym.blogspot.nl/2014/04/gbxml-for-rhinograsshopper.html)), but I found that some functions of these components were still not implemented yet. So my question is:                 Will the "GrizzlyBear" plug-in be suitable for the model exchange between Rhino/Grasshopper and Designbuilder as it is?   Again, I would really appreciate it if you kindly offer me these energy simulation components and GrizzlyBear, so that I could test the possibility of coupling GH models and Designbuilder. You can reach me at [yd52503028@gmail.com](mailto:yd52503028@gmail.com)
  Thank you very much in advance! Best regards, Ding
topic: Request for latest Honeybee (energy simulation components) and GrizzlyBear
